title.rendered: We Are Excited To Announce a New Member of Our Team!

content.rendered:
We are proud to announce the addition of a new member of our team! Samara Renovato is joining us to help manage our PR and Social Media operations. She is a student at the University of Chicago studying Psychology. With a new focus on how people interact with one another in the contemporary digital world, she will be able to explore the social aspects of the digital privacy movement and bring us all closer to one another in order to achieve our goals.

She will be directly managing our public relations and her work on our social media campaigns will help us direct our message to the world.

Welcome to our staff Samara! We all look forward to working with you!
